fetcher module¶

fetcher.fetchEndpoints(symbols, queries, overwrite=False)¶

Fetches financial data from a series of endpoints for a series of stock symbols

Parameters

  • symbols (list) – List of stock symbols to fetch data for

  • queries (list of dictionaries with keys {endpoint, params, name}) – List of queries to perform for each symbol

  • overwrite (bool, optional) – Whether to overwrite existing files if present, defaults to False

Returns

Number of new files written

Return type

int

fetcher.fetchFile(url, fileName, http)¶

Handles a single request to the FinancialModelingPrep API

Parameters

  • url (str) – Endpoint URL to request

  • fileName (str) – Relative path of filename to write response data to

  • http (urllib3.PoolManager) – urllib3 Pool Manager object

Stock-Evaluator
